name: Myip
body:
### How to install?
```
$ gem install myip
```


### How to use?
```
$ myip
```
### How colorize output?
```
$ gem install rainbow
```

### How colorize output on Windows?
```
$ gem install rainbow windows-pr win32console
```
tagline: Simply find out your IP address
